prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Bass, Guitar, Brass, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Organ, Bass, Guitar, Brass, and Drums, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Bass, Guitar, Brass, and Drums, with no Piano.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, which does include Organ, Bass, Guitar, Brass, and Drums.
